speech: I didn't quite catch what you wanted to order. Are you done ordering something? Just say you're done and we can wrap up.
Sorry, what were you trying to order? If you still want to order more, let me know what else you're interested in. Else tell me if you're done too!
Hmm, I don't recognize your order. Let me know what you want. If you're unsure of what's available, you can also ask for the menu :)
